languages.text: {n}Октавиана охотно подливает собравшимся, вроде как выполняя обязанности гостеприимной хозяйки, но вы замечаете, что дистанция между ее стулом и стулом Джай чуть меньше, чем принято у людей, связанных одним лишь поверхностным знакомством.{/n}

{n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана охотно подливает собравшимся, вроде как выполняя обязанности гостеприимной хозяйки, но вы замечаете, что дистанция между ее стулом и стулом Джай чуть меньше, чем принято у людей, связанных одним лишь поверхностным знакомством.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜欣然为桌上的酒杯斟满了酒，完美地扮演着女主人的角色。但你却注意到，她的椅子和婕伊的椅子靠得似乎有点太近了。如果两人只是普通的熟人，是断然不会离这么近的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜欣然为桌上的酒杯斟满了酒，完美地扮演着女主人的角色。但你却注意到，她的椅子和婕伊的椅子靠得似乎有点太近了。如果两人只是普通的熟人，是断然不会离这么近的。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナはテーブルの上にグラスを並べ、完璧なホスト役を演じたが、彼女とジェイの椅子が、表面的な付き合いしかなさそうな二人にしては、いつもより少し近くに置かれていることに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナはテーブルの上にグラスを並べ、完璧なホスト役を演じたが、彼女とジェイの椅子が、表面的な付き合いしかなさそうな二人にしては、いつもより少し近くに置かれていることに気づいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana rellena las copas de la mesa, ejerciendo de anfitriona consumada, pero ves que su silla y la de Jae están más juntas de lo acostumbrado para una pareja de amistades superficiales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana rellena las copas de la mesa, ejerciendo de anfitriona consumada, pero ves que su silla y la de Jae están más juntas de lo acostumbrado para una pareja de amistades superficiales.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana joue les hôtesses modèles et remplit rapidement tous les verres sur la table, mais vous remarquez que sa chaise et celle de Jae sont légèrement trop proches pour deux personnes n'étant en apparence que de simples connaissances.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana joue les hôtesses modèles et remplit rapidement tous les verres sur la table, mais vous remarquez que sa chaise et celle de Jae sont légèrement trop proches pour deux personnes n'étant en apparence que de simples connaissances.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Sogleich füllt Octaviana die Gläser auf dem Tisch und gibt die perfekte Gastgeberin ab, aber dir fällt auf, dass ihr und Jaes Stuhl etwas näher zusammenstehen. Näher als sie bei einer oberflächlichen Bekanntschaft stehen würden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sogleich füllt Octaviana die Gläser auf dem Tisch und gibt die perfekte Gastgeberin ab, aber dir fällt auf, dass ihr und Jaes Stuhl etwas näher zusammenstehen. Näher als sie bei einer oberflächlichen Bekanntschaft stehen würden.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, dört dörtlük bir ev sahibi gibi hareket ederek masaya hemen bardakları koyuyor. Onun ve Jae'ın sandalyelerinin, yüzeysel bir tanıdıklık seviyesindeki iki kişinin sandalyelerinin normalde durdukları mesafeden birazcık daha yakın yerleştirildiğini fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana readily tops up the glasses on the table, playing the role of consummate host, but you notice that her and Jae's chairs are drawn slightly closer together than usual for a pair who seem connected only by superficial acquaintance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana dört dörtlük bir ev sahibi gibi hareket ederek masaya hemen bardakları koyuyor ancak onun ve Jae'ın sandalyelerinin, yüzeysel bir tanıdıklık seviyesindeki iki kişinin sandalyelerinin normalde durdukları mesafeden birazcık daha yakın durduklarını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
